name: MR KOMANYO
description:
HELLO !

I'm KOMANYO. I'm on a mission. I came to strange monsters from an unknown place. Sadly, I spent all the people on the ground. It might seem silly to ask for this. I can not do anything alone so I ask you to help me jump out of those monsters.

Help MR KOMANYO escape from these damned monsters. Earn the highest points in this game and if you pass the 50,000 points you will win a valuable gift from MR KOMANYO.
